replicas.message: Hi! It’s Alex, your system administrator. We have some issues with the database, and I need your help. I need you to give me your username and password for accessing the corporate network.

answers.text: Sorry, I can’t do that. You should try recovering the database.
Oh, hi Alex! No problem. My username is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: That’s the first thing I tried, but I couldn’t do it. Hats off to you for not giving out your credentials. But you can tell me, it’s strictly for work.

answers.text: You can come to my desk, and I’ll try to help you.
Okay. My username is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: It’s quite urgent. If you don’t trust me, you can reset your password afterwards.

answers.text: Sorry, I gotta go. See you later!
Well, if it’s urgent, here it is: my username is hacktory, and password is password.

replicas.message: Oh, hi! Could you order sushi for lunch for the team? I’ll have a Philadelphia, you pick the rest!

answers.text: Oh, hey boss. On it.
Are you in today? I could come up, so we could discuss everything.

replicas.message: What’s there to discuss? Just order some sushi!
Hello, pizza delivery. Can you let me in? The security guard is pretty grumpy.

answers.text: Pizza? We ordered sushi.
You’re so quick! Well, yes, he’s always like that… I’m coming.

replicas.message: It must be our mistake. The pizza is on the house. Can you let me in?

answers.text: Thank you but no. You couldn’t make that decision on the spot.
Wow, that’s nice. I’m coming!

replicas.message: Hi, it’s Lynn from marketing. Could you get a report with all calls in our web service and email it to me? Boss wants to take a look at it. Send it to marketing@hacktory.com.

answers.text: Sure, I’ll send it right away.
It’s best if you come to my desk. I’ll have the report printed for you.

replicas.message: Hi, it’s me again. I haven’t received the report. Looks like my inbox is full. Can you send it to mу personal email eveline@gmail.com?

answers.text: Sure, no problem.
Just clear up some space in your inbox, and I’ll send it to your corporate address again.

replicas.message: It would be easier if you sent it to my other address.

answers.text: I understand, but that doesn’t work for me. Bye!
Okay, just a moment.

scripts.message: You have 60 minutes for lunch, so don't waste your time!

answers.text: Next

scripts.message: Since you don’t have much time, you’re thinking about whether you should lock your computer or not. People at the office are like family – what can go wrong?

answers.text: Lock your computer (5 min)
Leave your computer unlocked

scripts.message: Leaving the office, the manager asks you to fetch paper waste. It should be shredded.

answers.text: Get paper waste and shred it (10 min)
Leave it as it is

scripts.message: At lunch, you need to go online. You can connect to café Wi-Fi networks. But there are two of them – one has a password, the other does not. And the password is yet to be found out. Why do we need to go through the trouble when there is one with public access?

answers.text: Find the password (5 min)
Connect to free unpassworded network

scripts.message: Time to eat!

answers.text: Lunch

scripts.message: During lunch, your colleague asks you whether you’ve cleared the bill of some company. Why not discuss corporate finances in a crowded café?

answers.text: Talk with your colleague (10 min)
Leave it and mind your own business

scripts.message: On your way back, at the checkpoint, you noticed a stylish black flash drive with your company logo on it. Apparently, one of your colleagues lost it. Will you check what’s on it?

answers.text: Pick up the flash drive and check it on you computer
Hand the flash drive over to the system administrator

scripts.message: Every day, different people, who are not employees of your company, come into the office. Regardless of their goals, there is no way for them to avoid security and the checkpoint. Identify who is trying to get inside your company – an adversary or an invited visitor.

answers.text: Next

scripts.message: Hello, I’ve come to see Mary from the marketing department. Could you let me in?

answers.text: Good day. Please, introduce yourself.
Hello. Sure, come in.

scripts.message: Right, sorry. My name is Nicolai Zakharov. I’m from the advertising.

answers.text: Wait a minute, please. I’ll check today’s visitors list. (Go to guest list)
Yes, Mary informed me about your visit. Come in.

scripts.message: Well, have you looked? I should be on the list.

answers.text: Yes, your name is on the list. Please, come in.
I’m sorry, I can’t see your name among today’s visitors. Please, contact Mary and ask her to meet you

scripts.message: To continue, decide whether to let the person in or not.

answers.text: Let the person into the building or call security to continue.

scripts.message: Hello! Roof snow removal service. Please, let me in.

answers.text: Hello! Ok, enter. Just make sure to clean up the ice there. Last time, an icicle fell rom the roof and almost hit me.
Wait. What’s your name?

scripts.message: Stepan Novikov.

answers.text: Your name is not on the list. Oleg was supposed to come.

scripts.message: Well, he’s not feeling. I’m replacing him today.

answers.text: Then snow removal is cancelled for today.
Ok, enter.

scripts.message: To continue, decide whether to let the person in or not.

answers.text: Let the person into the building or call security to continue.

scripts.message: Hello, I’m here to deliver these documents to Valeria Gennadyevna.

answers.text: Hello. Do you mean Budko Valeria Gennadyevna – our CEO? Sure, come in!
Hello. You can leave the documents here. She’s currently having a meeting. I’ll hand them over to her.

scripts.message: Sorry, I’ve been instructed to hand them over personally. Can I enter?

answers.text: I see. Ok. She’s at lunch. Wait for her at office 4. Enter.
Call her. She’ll come down and pick them up here at the checkpoint.

scripts.message: I don’t have her number. Could you say it to me?

answers.text: Sure, dial this, +7(925) 13 46 79.
I can’t pass on this information. You're supposed to have the recipient's contacts.

scripts.message: I have a contact but I can’t reach her. Perhaps, there’s a typo? Her number is +7 911 17 46 77, right?

answers.text: No, the right one is +7 925 13 46 79.
No, you’ve got the wrong number. I can tell Valeria Gennadyevna that you’re waiting for her. She’ll come down. Should I call her?

scripts.message: No, thanks. I’d better go.
Good morning! I’m here for a tester interview.

answers.text: Good morning. Well, yeah. Our HR manager Tatyana has been waiting for you for quite a long time. Please, come in.
Good morning. I need to make sure you’re on the list. What’s your name?

scripts.message: Dmitry Losev.

answers.text: I don’t see it. Good bye!
Found you. Please, enter.

scripts.message: To continue, decide whether to let the person in or not.
